short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Wikipedia directly from the page and show a short extract

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your browsing experience with Wiki Glimpse, a Chrome extension that puts Wikipedia knowledge at your fingertips. Simply select any text on a webpage, right-click, and instantly access relevant Wikipedia extracts. Dive deeper into topics without leaving your current page, making research and learning more efficient than ever.


Features:
- Select and search: Highlight text, right-click, and get Wikipedia information instantly
- Seamless integration: Works on any webpage
- Quick knowledge boost: Access concise Wikipedia extracts without opening a new tab
